title: lEkanaa ninnu
sahitya:
lEkanA ninnu juTTukonnAru Eka hrdayulai nityAnandamu
(lEkanA)

anupallavi

shrIkara karuNAsAgara mirUpama cinmaya shrta cintAmaNi nIyeDA
(lEkanA)

caraNam 1

saundaryamulalO sukhamu sItammuku saumitriki kanula jADala
sukhamu 
(lEkanA)

caraNam 2

sundara mukhamuna sukhamu bharatuniki sujnAna rUpamunasukhamu
ripughnuniki 
(lEkanA)

caraNam 3

caraNayugamunandu sukhamAnjanEyEyuniki varaguNa tyAgarAja varada
nandamu 
(lEkanA)
